text: wlw 'ana lhwla' almushrikin biallah ma fi al'ard jamieana min maal wdhkhayr, wamithlah maeah mdaefana, labdhlwh yawm alqyamt; liaftaduu bih min su' aledhab, walaw bdhlu waftdu bih ma qubil mnhm, wala aghna eanhum min eadhab allah shyyana, wazahar lahum ywmydh min 'amr allah wedhabh ma lam yakunuu yahtasibun fi aldunya 'anah nazl bhm
